Kyrie Irving

Kyrie Andrew Irving Instagram: kyrieirving

(Uncle Drew, Ankletaker, World B. Flat, Kai)

Position: Point Guard and Shooting Guard Shoots: Right

6-2,195lb(188cm,88kg)

Team: Dallas Mavericks

Born: March 23, 1992 inMelbourne,Australia au

Relatives: CousinIsaiahBriscoe

College: Duke

High School: Saint Patrick in Elizabeth, New Jersey

Recruiting Rank: 2010 (2)

Draft: Cleveland Cavaliers, 1st round (1st pick, 1st overall), 2011 NBA Draft

NBA Debut: December 26, 2011

Experience:14 years

Player Injury

Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Kyrie Irving?

Kyrie Irving is 33 years old.

Where was Kyrie Irving born?

Kyrie Irving was born in Melbourne, Australia.

When was Kyrie Irving born?

Kyrie Irving was born on March 23, 1992.

How tall is Kyrie Irving?

Kyrie Irving is 6-2 (188 cm) tall.

How much does Kyrie Irving weigh?

Kyrie Irving weighs 195 lbs (88 kg).

Is Kyrie Irving in the Hall of Fame?

Kyrie Irving is not in the Hall of Fame.

When was Kyrie Irving drafted?

Kyrie Irving was drafted by Cleveland Cavaliers, 1st round (1st pick, 1st overall), 2011 NBA Draft.

What position does Kyrie Irving play?

Point Guard and Shooting Guard.

What is Kyrie Irving's net worth?

Kyrie Irving has made at least $311,776,851 playing professional basketball.

How much does Kyrie Irving make?

Kyrie Irving made $41,000,000 in 2025.

How many rings does Kyrie Irving have?

Kyrie Irving has won one championship.

What is Kyrie Irving's Instagram account?

Kyrie Irving is on Instagram at kyrieirving.

What schools did Kyrie Irving attend?

Kyrie Irving attended Saint Patrick in Elizabeth, New Jersey and Duke.

What are Kyrie Irving's nicknames?

Uncle Drew, Ankletaker, World B. Flat, Kai are nicknames for Kyrie Irving.

Is Kyrie Irving injured?

Kyrie Irving is listed as Out (Knee) - The Mavericks said on Monday (Sept. 29) that Irving is ahead of schedule in his left ACL recovery but there's no timeline on his return yet.
